name: Type of Service
title: TOS
definition: Identifies the quality of service desired.
validEntryNotes: TOS is an 8 position field but positions 7 and 8 are reserved for future use.
When populated the first six positions must contain a “0” or a “1”.
usageNotes: Optional when the associated LREF field is populated and the associated DSCP field is not populated, otherwise prohibited.
fieldNotes: The TOS provides an indication of the abstract parameters which characterize the service choices provided in the network.
The TOS and DSCP fields are mutually exclusive as they utilize the same byte position in the Internet Protocol header.
